structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Employment Permanency Duration Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of employment permanency duration categories for temporary and contract employment arrangements in labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Up to 6 months
structure:Code.common:Description: Temporary employment contracts with duration of up to 6 months.

structure:Code.common:Name: From 7 to 12 months
structure:Code.common:Description: Temporary employment contracts with duration between 7 and 12 months.

structure:Code.common:Name: More than 12 months
structure:Code.common:Description: Temporary employment contracts with duration exceeding 12 months.
